CSS a tip for printing :-)

04 Nov 2011

Super quick tip today, if you want to style your pages for printing then you really must add this to your arsenal of snippets:

.selector {
	page-break-inside: avoid;
	page-break-after: auto;
}

which stops elements from being sliced in half when they get printed.
